creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: tan bound book of various woodblock printed images: mostly landmarks, nature scenes, and travelers
markings: first page, LRC, relief seal; label ULQ front cover with Japanese inscription
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Hokusai's Sketchbooks (Hokusai manga 北斎漫画)
title: Transmitting the Spirit and Revealing the Form of Things: Hokusai's Sketchbooks, vol. 7
